    • buyDevelopmentCard

      public void buyDevelopmentCard​(java.lang.String cardId, int deckIndex, ConsumeTarget toConsume)
      Notify the message encoder that the player wants to buy a development card
      Parameters:
      cardId - id of the development card that player wants to buy
      deckIndex - deck index in which the player wants to put the development card
      toConsume - resources used for this buy action

    • removeResource

      Parameters:

    • pickResources

      public void pickResources​(MarbleSelection selection, java.util.ArrayList<ResourcePosition> positions, java.util.ArrayList<ResourceType> conversions)
      Notify the message encoder that the player wants to pick some resources from the marble market
      Parameters:
      selection - selection from the marble market
      positions - list of positions in which user wants to put the bought resources
      conversions - list of possible white marbles conversions chosen by the player

    • produceResources

      public void produceResources​(ConsumeTarget consumed, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> ids, java.util.Optional<ProductionEffect> genericProduction, java.util.ArrayList<ProductionEffect> leadersProductions)
      Notify the message encoder that the player wants to produce
      Parameters:
      consumed - resources used for this production action
      ids - list of development cards ids used for this production action
      genericProduction - optional generic production
      leadersProductions - list of productions from activated leader cards with production effects

    • pickCommandHandler

      public void pickCommandHandler​(MarbleSelection selection)
      Manages the player's pick resources from marble market action by finding all player's active leader cards with depot effects, leader cards with marble conversions effects and tells the UI to show this information in order to enable the player to make its choice
      Parameters:
      selection - selection from the marble market

    • buyCommandHandler

      public void buyCommandHandler​(java.lang.String id)
      Manages the player's buy development card action by finding all player's active leader cards with depot effects, leader cards with discount effects and tells the UI to show this information in order to enable the player to make its choice
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the development card that the player wants to buy

    • produceCommandHandler

      public void produceCommandHandler()
      Manages the player's production action by finding all player's active leader cards with production effects, leader cards with depot effects and tells the UI to show this information in order to enable the player to make its choice
